attributes.action: Governance of football clubs,continuing fit and proper person tests for owners.
attributes.background: My club, Bolton Wanderers are a founder-of the football league,years of instability including various winding up petitions have threatenied its existence. They are central to the Bolton community. A mechanism should be created to protect clubs and create a trust until their future can be preserved.

rejection.details: This would be the responsibility of individual football clubs and not the UK Government or Parliament.
